alert.note: Alert for Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 2:58AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...AREAS OF FOG CONTINUE OVER PARTS OF THE LOWCOUNTRY... Fog will continue impact portions of the Charleston Tri-County area into Colleton County early this morning. The fog will be locally dense at times with visibilities dropping to 1/4 mile or less at times. Motorists should use caution and be prepared for rapid changes in visibilities. The fog will impact Interstate 26, Interstate 526 and Interstate 95 as well as Highway 17, Highway 17 Alternate, Highway 78 and Highway 52. Conditions are expected to improve around sunrise.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed.

area.areaDesc: Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Tidal Berkeley
